div.p: My week is 9:00-6:00 but weekends are like 6:00-6:00 so 12 hour shifts. As soon as I walk through the door, phone the office to say I’m on site
check the diary to see whether staff are coming in during the night or during the day and basically watching CCTV, patrolling every hour
that’s going out of the building or inside the building sometimes and basically looking around, checking everything’s OK.
